messages.content: premiums for a plan in this policy that covers private hospitals. I'm 30 years old.

label: convo
test: You are a 40 year old who wants to know how much are the premiums for a Great Eastern health insurance plan that will cover up to Class A wards. Wait to be asked what your age is. The correct response is an additional premium of $137.53 on top of what is payable by MediSave.
